flavorText: The harder your strike, the stronger her defense.

foreignData.name: Schildtänzer
foreignData.text: {2}{W}: Das nächste Mal, wenn eine angreifende Kreatur Deiner Wahl in diesem Zug den Schildtänzern Schaden zufügen würde, fügt sich diese Kreatur den Schaden selber zu.

name: Shield Dancer
originalText:
o2oo
W The next time target attacking creature would deal combat damage to Shield Dancer this turn, that creature deals that damage to itself instead.

rulings.text: If the ability is used twice, it will cause the next two attacks this turn (which only happens if something gives a player two attacks) from the creature to “reflect” back to itself. It will not result in double damage back from a single attack.

text: {2}{W}: The next time target attacking creature would deal combat damage to Shield Dancer this turn, that creature deals that damage to itself instead.
